XMLRefDataClassification
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.ReferenceDataClassification
Key XMLGenericReferenceData
LoaderName XMLRefDataClassificationLoader
isDataChannelDependent false

XMLRefDataClassificationLoader
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.XMLFileClassificationLoader
FileName config/ReferenceData.xml

DetectedArchetypeClassification
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.DetectedArchetypeClassification
Key DetectedArchetypeClassification
GroupName DetectedArchetypeGroup
LoaderName DetectedArchetypeLoader
isDataChannelDependent false

DetectedArchetypeGroup
ARCHETYPE_CODE_LOOKUP ARCHETYPE_CODE_LOOKUP

DetectedArchetypeLoader
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.DetectedArchetypeLoader
DataRoot Database
DataSourceJNDI ibData
SQL_QUERY
select t2.DAT_NAME, t4.CAP_NAME, t3.OPERATOR_NAME, t1.CAP_VALUE, t2.APS_CODE from DETECTED_ARCHETYPES t2, ARCHETYPE_CAPABILITY t4, OPERATORS t3, ARCHE_CAP_INSTANCES t1 where t2.ID =t1.DA_ID and t4.ID=t1.AC_ID and t3.ID=t1.OPE_ID

ArchetypeGroupMapClassification
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.ArchetypeGroupMapClassification
Key ArchetypeGroupMapClassification
GroupName ArchetypeMapGroup
LoaderName ArchetypeGroupMapLoader
isDataChannelDependent false

ArchetypeMapGroup
ARCHETYPE_GROUPMAP_CODE_LOOKUP ARCHETYPE_GROUPMAP_CODE_LOOKUP

ArchetypeGroupMapLoader
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.ArchetypeGroupMapLoader
DataRoot Database
DataSourceJNDI ibData
SQL_QUERY
select t1.ID, t2.DAT_NAME, t3.DAG_NAME from DETECTED_ARCHETYPES t2, DETECTED_ARCHE_GROUPS t3, ARCHETYPE_GROUPMAPS t1 where t2.ID = t1.DA_ID and t3.ID=t1.DAG_ID

DatabaseRefClassification
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.ReferenceDataClassification
Key GenericReferenceData
LoaderName DatabaseClassificationLoader
isDataChannelDependent true

DatabaseClassificationLoader
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.DatabaseClassificationLoader
DataRoot Database
DataSourceJNDI ibData
SQL_QUERY
SELECT GROUP_CODE, GROUP_CODE_DESCRIPTION, LOOKUP_INDICATOR, LOOKUP_TYPE, LOOKUP_ID, LOOKUP_CODE, LOOKUP_TEXT, LOOKUP_VALUE_SD, LOOKUP_VALUE_MD, LOOKUP_VALUE_LD, LOOKUP_VALUE_LOCALE, ACTIVE, DISPLAY_SEQUENCE FROM VW_IB_LOOKUPS WHERE CHANNEL LIKE ?

InstructionClassification
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.InstructionClassification
Key InstructionClassification
GroupName InstructionGroup
LoaderName InstructionClassificationLoader
isDataChannelDependent true

InstructionGroup
INSTRUCTION_LOOKUP INSTRUCTION_LOOKUP

InstructionClassificationLoader
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.InstructionClassificationLoader
DataRoot Database
DataSourceJNDI ibData
SQL_QUERY
SELECT INS_MNEMONIC, HOST, EXT_SYS_ID, EPH_TEXT FROM INSTRUCTION_LOOKUP_VW WHERE CHANNEL LIKE ?

InstructionURLClassification
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.InstructionURLClassification
Key InstructionURLClassification
GroupName InstructionURLGroup
LoaderName InstructionURLClassificationLoader
isDataChannelDependent true

InstructionURLGroup
INSTRUCTION_URL_LOOKUP INSTRUCTION_URL_LOOKUP

InstructionURLClassificationLoader
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.InstructionURLClassificationLoader
DataRoot Database
DataSourceJNDI ibData
SQL_QUERY
SELECT A.URL_DESC, A.MNEMONIC, A.PRIORITY, A.NARRATIVE, A.ID, B.MNEMONIC PARENT_MNEMONIC FROM INSTRUCTIONS A, INSTRUCTIONS B WHERE A.INS_ID = B.ID(+) AND A.CHN_CODE LIKE ?

BankHolidayListClassification
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.BankHolidayListClassification
Key BankHolidayListClassification
GroupName BankHolidayListClassificationGroup
LoaderName BankHolidayListClassificationLoader
isDataChannelDependent false

BankHolidayListClassificationGroup
BANK_HOLIDAY_LIST_CLASSIFICATION_GROUP BANK_HOLIDAY_LIST_CLASSIFICATION_GROUP

BankHolidayListClassificationLoader
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.BankHolidayListClassificationLoader
DataRoot Database
DataSourceJNDI mmdb
SQL_QUERY SELECT HOL_DT FROM BANK_HOLIDAYS WHERE HOL_DT BETWEEN SYSDATE AND SYSDATE+60

LastLoadedEventsClassification
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.LastLoadedEventsClassification
Key LastLoadedEventsClassification
GroupName LastLoadedEventsClassificationGroup
LoaderName LastLoadedEventsClassificationLoader
isDataChannelDependent false

LastLoadedEventsClassificationGroup
LAST_LOADED_EVENTS_CLASSIFICATION_GROUP LAST_LOADED_EVENTS_CLASSIFICATION_GROUP

LastLoadedEventsClassificationLoader
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.LastLoadedEventsClassificationLoader
DataRoot Database
DataSourceJNDI mmdb
SQL_QUERY
SELECT EVT_EXT_SYS_ID_GRID,EVT_ID_GRID, EVT_EXT_SYS_ID_PDW,EVT_ID_PDW FROM LAST_LOADED_EVENTS WHERE LAST_LOADED_ID =(Select max(LAST_LOADED_ID) FROM LAST_LOADED_EVENTS)

MonitoringClassificationLoader
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.MonitoringClassification
Key MonitoringClassification
GroupName MonitoringGroup
LoaderName MonitoringClassificationLoaderName
isDataChannelDependent true

MonitoringGroup
IP IP
USER_AGENT USER_AGENT
REFERER_GREY REFERER_GREY
REFERER_WHITE REFERER_WHITE
REFERER_BLACK REFERER_BLACK
GENERIC_VALIDATOR GENERIC_VALIDATOR
FORM_DATA_PATTERN FORM_DATA_PATTERN
COOKIE_CHECK_NAME COOKIE_CHECK_NAME
COOKIE_CHECK_VALUE COOKIE_CHECK_VALUE
USER_AGENT_BLOCKED USER_AGENT_BLOCKED

MonitoringClassificationLoaderName
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.MonitoringClassificationLoader
DataRoot Database
DataSourceJNDI ibData
SQL_QUERY
SELECT ID, FM_TYPE AS TYPE, SUB_TYPE, FM_VALUE AS VALUE, EVENT, ACTION, SEVERITY, COND_ID, MIS_TAGS, TEXT, DETECTION_STATUS, MALWARE_TYPE, MALWARE_VARIANT, COMPROMISED_DATA_TYPE, COMPROMISED_DATA_ITEM, WEIGHT FROM FRAUD_MONITORING WHERE APS_CODE = 'APP' and (EXPIRY_DATE IS NULL OR EXPIRY_DATE > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) and CHN_CODE LIKE ?

SALES_ORIGINATORS SALES_ORIGINATORS

SalesOriginatorClassificationLoader
ClassName
com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.SalesOriginatorClassificationLoader
DataRoot Database
DataSourceJNDI ibData
SQL_QUERY
SELECT NAME, INS_ID, PROMO_PARTY_ID, CAMPAIGN_CODE, PROMO_CHANNEL_CD, CONTENT_PATH, GUARANTEED_IND, PRODUCT_PROPOSITION_ID,PRODUCT_ID, ID, SALESORG_ID PARENT_ID FROM sales_originators WHERE CHN_CODE LIKE ?

CONFIG_DATA_VALUES_GROUP CONFIG_DATA_VALUES_GROUP

com.lloydstsb.ea.referencedata.ConfigDataValuesLoader
DataRoot Database
DataSourceJNDI ibData
SQL_QUERY
SELECT REF_KEY, REF_VALUE FROM CONFIG_DATA_LOOKUP_VALUES WHERE CHANNEL_ID LIKE ?

DeviceSniffingClassification
ClassName
com.lbg.ib.api.sales.referencedata.DeviceSniffingClassification
Key DeviceSniffingClassification
GroupName DeviceSniffingGroup
LoaderName DeviceSniffingLoader
isDataChannelDependent true

DeviceSniffingGroup
DEVICE_SNIFFING_GROUP DEVICE_SNIFFING_GROUP

DeviceSniffingLoader
ClassName
com.lbg.ib.api.sales.referencedata.DeviceSniffingLoader
DataRoot Database
DataSourceJNDI ibData
SQL_QUERY
select a.ID, a.ACTION, a.CHN_CODE, a.DAG_ID, a.PROD_DESC, a.PROD_URL, a.STA_CODE, b.DAG_NAME from device_sniffs a, detected_arche_groups b where a.DAG_ID = b.ID And a.CHN_CODE LIKE ?
